reviews.review: This is just so fun to play with friends!!!
I want to play more but I'm waiting for it to enable cross saves on console

Its fun until you know what your doing. Get some friends, have some fun, never queue alone


Try not to rage every match.

or just play killer and rage anyway

maybe uninstall

Update: I change my mind this game is a mess. Every bug fix adds more bugs, every new character breaks an old one, if you plan on playing this game, have 3 other friends to play with or you will regret everything

Después de jugarlo, comencé a escuchar ruidos en casa, estaba perseguido, escuchaba mi corazón latir, me sentía nervioso, cuando mi perro salió de debajo de la cama, me cagué encima, me traumaron, me gusta.
Muy bueno el juegito solo que NO QUIERO JUGAR 500 H PARA TENER LAS PERKS QUE  NECESITO PARA QUE NO ME COJAN LOS SURVIS, den mas puntos de sangre porque ZZZZ farmear puntos de sangre

Наиграв 140 часов могу сказать, что игра мне понравилась. Но не каждому может понравится просто бегать и чинить генераторы. Если вы научитесь бегать от маньяка и правильно мансить в постройках - то  погони станут весёлыми и увлекательными. Игра за маньяка намного веселей, так как вам нужно разрабатывать стратегии по поимке выживших, следить за генераторами и  правильно подбирать навыки для поимки выживших.  Важное примечание не будьте токсичными. :) Я редактировал этот обзор.

Games are the same they've always been there's some good ones some mehh ones some really bad ones just how its going to go. You will still find face camping trash killers and even though they implemented skilled based match making its still broken as you will get matched with iridescent ranks at bronze level or higher. But i still play this game and will always be one of my favorites :).
el mejor juego que jugue en loa vida, mira que jugue miles de juegos e, el mejor
Apparently, it really is a fun game.
Can't find any matches! I've wasted hours trying to connect to a match to just play the dang game. Bruh fix these servers or matchmaking system, I just wanna play the game!!

The early game grind to get decent perks as a killer is rough, I will take off 3 points for because of having to purchase characters + having to grind with no like blood point boosts outside of BBQ and Chili.
The competitive aspect of the game is pretty good but a good majority of at least 20-30% of my games involves playing with or against toxic survivors who  block you on stairs so you get downed or disconnect when you down them as a hunter. LOTS of that, outside of this... This game is a very solid 7/10 with a good amount of time spent just learning new mechanics and improving your gameplay loop with better perks that play to the strengths and help alleviate the weaknesses of your specific hunter.
 My 3 favorite hunters are Ghost Face, Executioner, and Demogorgon, Respectively these are pretty solid for the way to enjoy playing the game. I would say if you're a new player to grab plague. blight and clown for their really strong perks that can be shared with others.
Thanks for reading. Enjoy.
Summary: 7/10 game with some glaring issues including bugs/ lack of 144 refresh rate support as well as serious toxicity in the survivor community. (personal experience has left me seeing that most hunters are pretty fair and don't do anything too toxic)
Bardzo spoko gierka, męczą jedynie lagi czasami, jak się blokujesz, ale jakoś mocno  to nie przeszkadza :)
No tengo mucho que decir ya que he jugado muy poco, pero la verdad me gusta, está bastante bien, los gráficos, y los personajes, aunque no juego con todos.
bruh I got hit through a pallet
Worst game with a RETARDED community! Face camping killers and they do nothing about it!
Doesnt cost its money. Not fun, desyncing, phantom hits, etc. Only depression, apathy and wish to delete the game
aguante el faso y el diego
jogo massa, gráficos interessantes, mas desbalanceado demais

ㄏ勝

The game has a harsh learning curve but is fun to casually play with friends. If you are willing to spend time learning mechanics and tricks it is a fun and intense game but will be intimidating if you just want a pick up and play game and solo queue can be a grind to not feel like you are useless.  Overall, this game is fun if you put in the time and don't tilt when you get bullied while you are leveling your first few characters and you will be bullied even when playing as the killer if you dont know what you are doing.
只有对血点感到满足的人才会睡觉。

Знаете что самое приятное и намного прекраснее сек$а?
Это то, когда ты начинаешь катку за Они и в течении 15 минут всех вешаешь, а последнего выжившего ты просто убиваешь с memento mori, смотря как твой сильный и брутальный красавчик отрывает жертве язык, ломая при этом черепушку!
Вот она, игра для расслабления и приятных звуков воплей твоих жертв.
(я если что не садист, просто правда иногда очень нравится вечерком покромсать кого-то)
Рекомендую и советую, всем желающим!

For Casuals, this game serves the right amount of horror and lesser skill requirenment to enjoy.
For Competitive players, DBD has a very high skill balance and more challenge than a lot of other games I've played
This all doesn't even come close to what you can do with friends in survive or kill your friends modes
noice game to play with your friends

Play as either a survivor or killer... Personally my favorite is killer, the only downside to that is that some people never stop playing this game and they know all the shortcuts, wedges, etc really they know every way possible to get away. When I'm survivor I end dying most the time, But the healing and generator mechanics are pretty good. I would give this game a 10/10 highly recommended.

買って間もないですが既に飽きかけています。
キラーはサバイバーを何度も捕まえて吊らないといけないのが単純に面倒。あとほとんどのサバイバーが煽り厨。加えてキラー視点はとても3D酔いしやすい。
サバイバーは発電機を見つけて直すのですがボタンを押しっぱなしにするだけ。あとたまにタイミングよくボタン押すだけ。ただの作業ゲーとしか思えなかった。

Server sind krotten schlecht! Das Spiel war vor 1-2 Jahren viel besser und spielbarer vorallem auf Konsolen. Dauernd wird von Hitbox-Fix geredet aber trotzdem bleibt es schlecht mit den Hitboxen! Die neuen Maps haben kleinere Loops und sind teilweise balanced. Bloodlust wurde wegen der unfairen Infinites und Loops/Paletten Spawns reingebracht. Wann nehmt Ihr Bloodlust raus? Ohne Bloodlust wäre vlt. schonmal ein Teil der schlechten Hitboxen aus dem Spiel.

Cara assim, o game é incrivel (juntando PC e console devo ter umas 600h atualmente), mas tem alguns problemas realmente pateticos pra idade do game que vai fazer 5 anos. Não falo do grinding desgraçado q esse game tem pra iniciantes e tbm não falo da quantidade de DLC q vc vai precisar comprar se decidir virar main killer e quiser ter uma build decente sem esperar pra krl pra dropar perk bom na Shrine. Falo de problemas como: Hitbox que o felling é horroroso pra ambos os lados (survival e killer). È incrivel o quão comum é vc ficar com o sentimento q o Hit não pegou mas contou e q o Hit pegou mas não contou. E isso é extremamente visivel em bonecos como Freddy e Huntress. Isso sem falar em lançamentos de DLC que não raro são extremamente caoticos para o game. A DLC do Resident Evil e a Binding of The Kin 
 por exemplo foram DLCs extremamente zoadas quando sairam fazendo o game bugar DEMAIS. E sem falar de DLCs como All-Kill e Ghostface, q trouxeram bonecos extremamente fracos e ruins em seus lançamentos. Mas sim, e um game que acho q vale a pena jogar apesar dos pesares e da frustração e como adendo, Jesus... nunca vi comunidade pra chorar tanto pra TUDO TUDO ESSA POHA CHORA LITERALMENTE TUDO. Vc foi avisado se comprar o game :>
Going back it is as fun as it was back in 2016 grab some friends and have a thrilling time :)
Bon jeu ! Très fun surtout avec des amis ! Reste toujours fun même sans amis !
